alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:30PM MDT until June 06 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... Northern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 429 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were developing along a line extending from 6 miles north of Sugar City to 10 miles southwest of Arlington to 8 miles southeast of North La Junta. Another severe thunderstorm will enter the warning area from Crowley County after 445 PM MDT, tracking southeastward north of the La Junta area. Movement of this activity is east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Arlington, Blue Lake, Hasty and McClave. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
